properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 8:28AM CST until February 16 at 10:48PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* until Sunday February 16.
* At 08 AM Thursday the stage was 28.1 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring AND Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 28.6 feet on Thursday February 13.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Monday February 10 and will
continue rising to near 28.6 feet by Thursday February 13. The
river will fall below flood stage Sunday February 16.
* At 30.0 feet...Highway 6 between Amory and Bigbee is flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
